ygData.subject: Re: exploitable quest?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sorry, I wasn t clear.  I meant LOW level hobbits; like 1 to 8. Definitely not SoW 14 ish range. The first 5 (non-anon) level 3 s on Vallon were all Hobbit
ygData.messageBody:
Ramon writes:
> From: Ramon <rayf@...>
>
> hehe. Yeah, it's called the kiting quest and it goes like this: find a
> red mob, any red mob, hit it with a DOT and then run around on those
> tiny SoW-powered legs until it drops dead.

Sorry, I wasn't clear. I meant LOW level hobbits; like 1 to 8.
Definitely not SoW 14'ish range.

The first 5 (non-anon) level 3's on Vallon were all Hobbit Druids.
Within a VERY short time. I know Misty is a good leveling area, but
not that good, and why only druids?

--
Frake, Rodcet Nife
Iilii, Vallon Zek
